answers.answer: Oh goodness. Not your partner's fault that he can sleep and you can't.Headaches when pregnant sure do stink.  Tylenol can take the edge off a little.  If your boyfriend wakes up (either naturally or you wake him), a light massage on the neck and scalp and temples can really help too.good luck and hope you feel better

I know its not his fault and i would never actully hit him,..Ive been taking Tylenol, it doesnt help a bit!My blood pressure has been quite high, thats causing the head aches.... Ill find out Monday if i have preeclampsia

Oh, I hope it hasn't gone to preeclampsia!  I had high blood pressure with my first  It never progressed to preeclampsia thank goodness.  But it did spike after I gave birth.  We were in the hospital an extra day due to my high blood pressure!  Hang in there and hope all is well.
Thank you! Lol now hes snoring in my ear,... He better be glad i love him!

question: My head is killing me! For 3 days it has hurt and i just dont feel good at all!Hubby is laying there sleeping like a baby, like he doesnt have a care in the world! He even seems to have this like "ahh hahaha" smirk on his face.If i was a mean person, i would just punch him in the face!
title: punch in the face!
